title: Breathtaking Studio, 1 Bath in West Loop! Available now!!!
posting_body: Locally-made materials are featured throughout the building, including handmade tile from a Chicago artisan in the rooftop lounge.
Large windows offering natural light, beautiful finishes and spacious accommodations are only the beginning in this building.
This thoughtfully designed community offers Bosch appliances, soft close drawers, and unique kitchen layouts.
For our environmentally friendly residents we offer The Roof Crop, an urban 8,000-square-foot rooftop farm that is commercially maintained and harvested.

The produce from the urban farm will be distributed to local restaurants, grocers, and our residents, offering curated events that includes Farmers Markets, Farm Cocktails & Bites and Cooking Workshops.
This wonderful place has everything you need, and then some.
